'''''A Walk Through the Shire''''' is a book with blank pages decorated by illustrations depicting various scenes from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s [[legendarium]], intended to be used as a note-book. It also contains an introductory text.

== See also ==

*''[[A Hobbit's Journal]]''
*''[[A Hobbit's Travels]]''
*''[[A Tolkien Journal]]''
